headline: Materials Stocks Are Surging Over 20% and XLB Offers the Easiest Way to Ride That Wave
summary: Materials companies operate at the front end of nearly every supply chain. When construction picks up, steel and cement move. When factories expand, they need chemicals and gases. When consumer spending rises, packaging demand follows. The Materials Select Sector SPDR Fund (NYSEARCA:XLB) gives investors exposure to this cyclical sector through a single, low-cost vehicle. Pure ... Materials Stocks Are Surging Over 20% and XLB Offers the Easiest Way to Ride That Wave
